body_html:
Just to bump this - I'm seeing exactly the same behavior. Models which train well on 0.11 do not improve in 0.12.

I am using the same GPU & library versions as @yaroslavvb. I've also attempted to use cudnn 5.0 without success.

I will try and post the requested values when I have time as well.

body:
Just to bump this - I'm seeing exactly the same behavior. Models which train well on 0.11 do not improve in 0.12.

I am using the same GPU & library versions as @yaroslavvb. I've also attempted to use cudnn 5.0 without success.

I will try and post the requested values when I have time as well.
